meanings.definition: Jocularities: the quality or state of being jocular
meanings.sent1: Her constant jocularities brought laughter to the room.
meanings.sent2: The comedian's jocularities entertained the audience.
meanings.sent3: The jocularities of the clown made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: His jocularities were like a ray of sunshine on a gloomy day.
meanings.sent5: The jocularities of the party made it unforgettable.

meanings.sent1: The stand-up comedian's jocularities had the crowd roaring with laughter.
meanings.sent2: We shared jocularities over dinner, making the evening enjoyable.
meanings.sent3: His jocularities at work always lighten the mood.
meanings.sent4: The jocularities in the movie had everyone in stitches.
meanings.sent5: The jocularities in the book made it a delightful read.
